formatDescription: DM3 is a file format produced by some Digital Micrography instruments created by Gatan. Please contact the PRONOM team if you are able to provide a more detailed description.
provenanceCompoundName: Bodleian Library, University of Oxford / Bodleian Library, University of Oxford

internalSignatures.name: Gatan Digital Micrograph 3
internalSignatures.note:
BOF version 3 {4} endianness 00 = big, 01 = little {6} (tag directory|tag) {2-256} (2 byte tag length value + tag name which can be of zero length. Theroetically tag name could be ~65k long but limiting to 256 bytes for signature efficiency as highly unlikely to be greater. Scope to extend if necessary though). String "%%%%"

EOF: 8 null bytes
